reviewText: I've used this study three times and each time the groups have gained a deeper appreciation of the true meaning of our Lord's First Advent. Rick Warren truly is a wonderful teacher. His insights and commentary are exceptional. Small group leaders and participants alike will come out of this study blessed with understanding and knowledge that will enable them to pass on the story of Christmas to others as never before.
Good on target purpose for Christmas message. I am recommending this product and using it next year for our Christmas time special message.
